Method Detail

createResponseQueue

java.util.concurrent.SynchronousQueue createResponseQueue()
Creates and returns a synchronous queue for use in the RPC consumer.
Returns:

rpc

java.lang.Object rpc(RabbitMessageProperties properties)
Sends a message to the bus and waits for a reply, up to the "timeout" property. This method returns a Message object if autoConvert is set to false, or some other object type (string, list, map) if autoConvert is true. The logic for the handler is based on the RPC handler found in spring's RabbitTemplate.
throws:
TimeoutException
throws:
ShutdownSignalException
throws:
IOException
throws:
IllegalArgumentException
Returns:

rpc

java.lang.Object rpc(groovy.lang.Closure closure)
Sends a message to the bus and waits for a reply, up to the "timeout" property. This method returns a Message object if autoConvert is set to false, or some other object type (string, list, map) if autoConvert is true.
throws:
ShutdownSignalException
throws:
IOException
throws:
IllegalArgumentException
Parameters:
closure
Returns:
@throws TimeoutException

rpc

java.lang.Object rpc(java.lang.String routingKey, java.lang.Object body)
Sends a message to the bus and waits for a reply, up to the "timeout" property. This method returns a Message object if autoConvert is set to false, or some other object type (string, list, map) if autoConvert is true.
throws:
ShutdownSignalException
throws:
IOException
throws:
IllegalArgumentException
Parameters:
routingKey - Routing key to send the message to.
body - Message payload.
Returns:
@throws TimeoutException

rpc

java.lang.Object rpc(java.lang.String exchange, java.lang.String routingKey, java.lang.Object body)
Sends a message to the bus and waits for a reply, up to the "timeout" property. This method returns a Message object if autoConvert is set to false, or some other object type (string, list, map) if autoConvert is true.
throws:
ShutdownSignalException
throws:
IOException
throws:
IllegalArgumentException
Parameters:
exchange - Exchange to send the message to.
routingKey - Routing key to send the message to.
body - Message payload.
Returns:
@throws TimeoutException

withConfirmsOrDie

void withConfirmsOrDie(groovy.lang.Closure closure)
Performs a series of operations with the same channel and with confirms enabled. This method will throw an exception if any messages are n'acked.
Parameters:
closure

withConfirmsOrDie

void withConfirmsOrDie(java.lang.String connection, groovy.lang.Closure closure)
Performs a series of operations with the same channel created from the given connection and with confirms enabled. This method will throw an exception if any messaged are n'acked.
